summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a wire transfer from JPMorgan to DB Hyperion Air Inc. Richard Kahn is seeking clarification on the status of the funds, while Janet Young confirms the wire was sent and is following up with another contact at DB. The email highlights the communication between financial professionals regarding account management.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as being out of the office and is the intended recipient of Richard Kahn's inquiry.

Janet Young is attempting to contact Lisa Hurd for information about the wire transfer, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Wire Transfer Sent
events.description: A wire transfer from JPMorgan to DB Hyperion Air Inc. was confirmed to have been sent on this date.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is inquiring about a wire transfer that was supposed to be received by DB Hyperion Air Inc.
Janet Young confirms that the wire transfer was sent on February 25, 2014.
Lisa Hurd is contacted by Janet Young to track down the receipt of the funds.
Amanda Kirby is mentioned as being out of the office during this correspondence.
The email correspondence indicates ongoing financial transactions and communication between financial professionals.
